entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:07 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:07 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
